players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That is a lie, Bob. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. Why are you trying to frame me?"
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. I believe Charlie is telling the truth."
Bob: "Alice, if you were the detective, you would know Diana was already dead and couldn't be investigated. You just revealed yourself as the mafia partner trying to save Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob is lying. He claims he investigated me, but I was the one who investigated Diana. He's trying to confuse us and turn town against town. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
